content: starving artist by laura linneman using the stretchy cast-on of your choice cast-on 54 styles stitches join in the round being careful not to twist beret slouchy beret begin to work in 1x2 twisted rib pattern as follows beret style is pictured in green *k1tbl p2 repeat from * across the entire round slouchy beret is pictured in blue on work 2 inches in 1x2 twisted rib page 2 increase round *k1tbl puff&b puff&b repeat from * materials across the entire round you will now have 90 size 10 5 16inch circular needle stitches on your needle and dpns 1 skein malabrigo chunky 104 next round work in 1x4 twisted rib as follows yards bulky weight for beret style *k1tbl p4 repeat from * across the entire round or 1 skein vintage chunky 130 work 1x4 twisted rib until the total hat measures 7 yards bulky weight for slouchy 9 inches from the cast-on edge beret tapestry needle decrease as follows switching to double pointed gauge needles when required 3 stitches per inch in 1x4 twisted ribbing copyright laura linneman llinnema@gmail com www theknitgirllls com decrease rounds r1 * k1tbl p2tog p2 repeat from * to the end of the round r2&3 *k1tbl p3 repeat from * to the end of the round r4 *k1tbl p1 p2tog repeat from * to the end of the round r5&6 *k1tbl p2 repeat from * to the end of the round r7 *k1tbl p2tog repeat from * to the end of the round r8&9 k1tbl p1 repeat from * to the end of the round r10 k2togtbl across the entire round r11&12 ktbl across the entire round r 13 k2togtbl across the entire round 9 stitches remain cut yarn leaving a 5 inch tail place yarn on tapestry needle and pull the end through the live stitches weave in all ends firmly terms used ktbl knit stitch through the back loop p purl the number of stitches listed puff&b purl into the front and back of the stitch to create an additional stitch p2tog purl 2 stitches together to form 1 stitch k2togtbl knit 2 stitches together through the back loop of the stitch copyright laura linneman
